overview: After releasing their first full Japanese album in May 2018, EXO-CBX took their Magic on the road with the Magical Circus tour which attracted 80,000 fans to eight shows. Due to popular demand, the EXO subunit added more shows at Saitama Super Arena and Kobe World Hall for the 2019 Special Edition of the tour! This is a recording of the April 16th, 2019 concert at the Saitama Super Arena.
title: EXO-CBX "MAGICAL CIRCUS" 2019 -Special Edition-
